content.text:
Let me analyze the target structure and provide step-by-step instructions to build it.

Analysis of the Main Target Image:
- The structure has 8 blocks in total
- It consists of 4 layers
- The base consists of two green rectangular blocks forming a "bridge"
- A yellow horizontal block sits on top of the green "bridge"
- The third layer has a house-like structure with blue and red cube blocks
- A green horizontal block connects the blue and red cubes
- The top layer has an orange triangular roof made of two pieces

Block Selection and Assembly Order:
{
    Step1: Move block with index 6 (vertical green block for left bridge support)
    Step2: Move block with index 6 (vertical green block for right bridge support)
    Step3: Move block with index 8 (horizontal yellow block)
    Step4: Move block with index 1 (blue cube)
    Step5: Move block with index 3 (red cube)
    Step6: Move block with index 5 (horizontal green block for top connection)
    Step7: Move block with index 11 (left orange roof piece)
    Step8: Move block with index 12 (right orange roof piece)
}

This assembly sequence builds the structure from bottom to top, ensuring stability throughout the construction process. Each block is selected to match exactly the orientation shown in both the target image and the block dictionary.
